name: N0-EXIT

Description:Explore the mine in search for supplies, weapons and minerals , help team members and detore the most hideous creatures of the underworld and desvendo the secrets buried there.Synopsis:An unknown element was found in an abandoned mine , this element was sent to a laboratory for scientific analysis .
when scientists were opening the container they were surprised because the element had disintegrated .

a team was sent to explore the mine in search of more samples of unknown material , to enter the cave noticed a large amount of chemical waste scattered everywhere .

when derepente a strong shudder causes a cave leaving esquipe trapped in the mine.
